remarks: The uniform structure on uniform space ` W ` .  This proof uses a trick with ~ fvprc to avoid requiring ` W ` to be a set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ussval.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
ussval.2 $e |- U = ( UnifSet ` W ) $.
ussval $p |- ( U |`t ( B X. B ) ) = ( UnifSt ` W ) $.
